name: OtpQrSafetyReport
summary: Result of OTP QR scan safety evaluation.

properties.name: HasSufficientContrast
properties.summary: Gets whether contrast meets the minimum recommendation.

properties.name: HasSufficientQuietZone
properties.summary: Gets whether quiet zone meets the minimum recommendation.

properties.name: HasSufficientModuleSize
properties.summary: Gets whether module size meets the minimum recommendation.

properties.name: HasOpaqueColors
properties.summary: Gets whether colors are fully opaque.

properties.name: HasRecommendedErrorCorrection
properties.summary: Gets whether error correction level matches OTP recommendation.

properties.name: RecommendedQuietZone
properties.summary: Gets the recommended quiet zone size in modules.

properties.name: IsOtpSafe
properties.summary: Gets whether the rendering is likely OTP-safe.
